products.name: Free Comic 2017
products.description: A free mini-comic for Free Comic Book Day 2017 with contributions from Pam Wishbow, James Stanton, Jonathan Bell Wolfe, Lara Kaminoff, Erik Schneider Gutierrez, and Bjorn Daniel Miner.
products.details: 28 pgs. Blue and Mahagony ink on French Paper 50#T Dur-O-Tone Newspaper White. Edition of 300.

products.name: Foreman General: Issue Two
products.description: Global Mega City Construction strong-arms a deal with the government.
products.details: 16 pgs. Blue ink on French Paper 70#T Glo-tone Orange Light. Edition of 50.

products.name: Cat Claw
products.description: DJ Cat Claw finds herself in a desperate situation where she must either use her secret powers or see a loved one get hurt.
products.details: 48 pgs. Mahogany ink on French Paper 70#T Glo-tone Yellow Light. Hand-made record sleeve cover printed with Blue and Mahogany ink on French Paper 65#C Glo-tone Yellow Light. Edition of 50.

products.name: Foreman General: Issue One
products.description: A spy infiltrates an enemy construction site.
products.details: 16 pgs. Blue ink on French Paper 70#T Glo-tone Orange Light. Edition of 50.

products.name: Danger! Villainous Monster!
products.description: Forty tokusatsu villains from shows like Kamen Rider, Barom 1, Himitsu Sentai Gorenger, and Spider-Man.
products.details: 40 pgs. Blue ink on French Paper 70#T Poptone Sweettooth. Edition of 100.

products.name: Help!
products.description: Help your community grow, achieve, learn, and build! It's amazing what a helping hand can do.

products.name: The Dead Sound
products.description: A skeleton band reunites for one last time to play a gig on Halloween night.
products.details: 16 pgs. Black ink on French Paper 70#T Pop-Tone Lemon Drop and 65#C Pop-Tone Orange Fizz. Edition of 200.

products.name: Shots
products.description: A man struggles with regret as he attempts to sink one last free-throw.

products.name: Trade-Off
products.description: An exploration of lighting and tone comparing familiar objects of the city and countryside
products.details: 16 pgs. Black and blue ink on French Paper 50#T Dur-O-Tone Newspaper White. Edition of 50.

products.name: Whitey's Woods
products.description: A short essay reflecting on the single image the author conjures when he thinks of home.
products.details: Black, green, and blue ink on French Paper 80#C Construction Whitewash. Edition of 50.

products.name: Nothing Special
products.description: A trip to Japan reconnects the author with his family and heritage.
products.details: 24 pgs. Laminated gold foil adheared to toner on French Paper 80#C Construction Electric Red with black Risograph on general newsprint interiors. Edition of 75.
